创建新链表：

const newList = {
    val: -1,
    next: null,
};
let tempList = newList;

双指针填充链表：

let left = 1, right = arr.length-1
    while(left <= right) {
        head.next = arr[right] // 添加节点
        right--
        head = head.next // 移动节点指针

        head.next = arr[left] // 添加下一节点
        left++
        head = head.next // 移动节点指针
    }
    head.next = null // 最后一个节点置空，避免出现环

链表转为数组:

// 输入 head
if(!head) return null;
    let tempHead = head;
    let arr = [];
    while(tempHead){
        arr.push(tempHead);
        tempHead = tempHead.next;
    }
